#accessible-menu {
  position: relative;
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  list-style: none; }
  #accessible-menu li a {
    color: #000;
    background-color: #fff;
    text-decoration: none;
    position: absolute;
    z-index: 99999;
    left: -9999px;
    top: -2px;
    font-size: 1.8rem;
    font-weight: bold;
    padding: 5px 15px;
    border: 2px solid #000;
    outline: 0; }
    #accessible-menu li a:focus {
      left: 0;
      position: fixed;
      background-color: yellow !important;
      color: black !important; }

[data-contrast="toggle"] {
  padding: 0;
  background: none;
  font-size: 2.2rem;
  line-height: 1;
  cursor: pointer;
  vertical-align: middle; }
